ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains the plasma electron density derived from electric field mutual impedance spectra obtained by on-ground analysis of RPC-MIP spectra acquired when RPC-MIP operated in active modes (SDL and LDL).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator(s), the RPC-MIP Team, the ESA Planetary Science Archive as well as the CDPP (Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of these data when making a publication using these data. Principal Investigator(s) : P. Henri (LPC2E/CNRS, Orléans, France)

Parameter.Name: delta_time
Parameter.Description: Each RPCMIP measurement is acquired and averaged on-board during a certain duration. DELTA_TIME is half the acquisition duration

Parameter.Name: Electron density uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Estimated uncertainty of the plasma electron density

Parameter.Name: SNR Quality
Parameter.Description: Local quality of the plasma frequency signature in the spectrum between 0 (worst quality) and 1 (best quality) see RPCMIP User Guide for more details

Parameter.Name: Spectrum quality
Parameter.Description: Quality describing the spectrum complexity between 0 (worst quality) and 1 (best quality) see RPCMIP User Guide for more details

Parameter.Name: Density detection rate
Parameter.Description: Density detection rate in a 320 sec (10 operation cycles) window centered on the considered density value between 0 (worst quality) and 1 (best quality) see RPCMIP User Guide for more details

Parameter.Name: Instrument mode
Parameter.Description: Instrument mode at the time of acquisition (LDL, SDL)

Parameter.Name: Instrument telemetry rate
Parameter.Description: Instrument telemetry rate (Normal rate, Burst rate)
